website_summaries.verdict: Fair price for a model by a leading brand in batteries, especially considering it comes with its own batteries.
pros: Decent collection of features including zoom focus and 3 beam settings
Has some weight to it, so quality is apparent
Soft coating provides a bit of a bounce if you drop it, which minimizes damage
cons: Not significantly brighter than comparable models with few lumens, so some consumers aren’t sold on upgrading to this model

customer_reviews.title: Vendor won’t respond regarding DOA unit.
customer_reviews.text: Batteries were DOA. Bought some new Duracell batteries at the store. Flashlight lit up for a few moment nicely bright. But then failed. Switch seems broken. We have another of these that works great. This one defective. Vendor won’t respond to emails.
customer_reviews.author: Clark

customer_reviews.title: I thought that they were very good. So I thought that this would be even ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after previously buying the two pack of the 700 flashlights. I thought that they were very good. So I thought that this would be even better. The light from this seems brighter, but not a huge amount, and the color is much whiter. This is pretty bright and would definitely dazzle someone across a dark living room. The biggest drawback is the less common C cell batterjes. Overall this is a very good flashlight.
customer_reviews.author: Steve D

customer_reviews.title: this thing is awesome. Super bright and I love how you can ...
customer_reviews.text: this thing is awesome. Super bright and I love how you can it can be a flood light and a spot light with little effort. Only disadvantage is where the on off switch is. On the bottom. I would prefer the button be on the side
customer_reviews.author: weaponx

customer_reviews.title: Bright Light and Easy to Adjust
customer_reviews.text: I really like this flashlight. It's bright and the light can be adjusted to a narrow beam or a very wide beam. The adjustment is done by sliding the forward part of the flashlight back and forth. I'd prefer a twist adjustment but the slide works. Batteries seem to last quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: Bernie Bernbaum

customer_reviews.title: Great bright light.
customer_reviews.text: Great light. Replaced an older version as that one did not like being in the rain. The flood to spot focus area DOES NOT like getting rain or moisture on it. The lumens this light has is awesome. Finding out about the focus zoom in the rain,,not so much. 1-2hours on bright 10+ hours on dim Strobe Makes for a good light for in your vehicle. Just keep it away from any air vents under your seat as condensation will get to it and ruin it. Update: once dried out with no batteries in them and not used for awhile the lights work again. Just do not use in rain or get the zoom/flood slide sleeve wet.
customer_reviews.author: A shopper

customer_reviews.title: The bright down cast light can be easily seen by drivers while we are walking the dog ...
customer_reviews.text: This adjustable light works very well. Plus I can adjust the light spread cast on the ground so we don't step on frogs or toads when we are out walking the dog at night. The bright down cast light can be easily seen by drivers while we are walking the dog facing night time traffic using our small neighborhood roadway.
customer_reviews.author: DGrubb

customer_reviews.title: Update: Don’t waste your money. Bought 2 one defective and they would take it back
customer_reviews.text: Update. We put new batteries in the one that didn’t work, hoping the batteries shipped with it were the problem. They weren’t, but now, not wanting to return a product unless it really didn’t work, they won’t take it back as it is beyond the 30 days. Very poor customer service given the product is defective. I get burned, and burned through an additional set of batteries... We bought 2. One is fantastic the other, the batteries drained and it wasn’t working a week later. Will put in new batteries and update what happens. Hoping that is it and not a malfunction in what seems to be a great light.
customer_reviews.author: maudedog

customer_reviews.title: Nice focused beam. Great light.
customer_reviews.text: Whoa its like walking around with headlights. I've even given them as gifts. Very impressive beam, nice weight and quality. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ZenReader

customer_reviews.title: Light will not turn off
customer_reviews.text: Has never worked correctly. Out of package it would flash about every 20 seconds or so. Now it will not turn off without removing the batteries. Cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great light
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these after a stay at a cabin rental in North Georgia. They had one on the property which I used to walk my dog at night. The beam can be focused for a wide spread or a narrow square patch of light. It illuminated everything so well my dog was more concerned with going after all the toads we wouldn't have seen otherwise (she probably would have anyways), than using the bathroom. LOL! I just might purchase the 500 lumen to keep in my truck.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Judy

customer_reviews.title: Duracell Durabeam Flashlight
customer_reviews.text: These came quicker than I expected and are of high quality for the price. I find them to be bright for their size. I carry a small over the shoulder bag and I can fit one in there. I’m glad about that because we have no street lights and it gets pitch black. I’m glad to have this little, powerful light to show the way and then some. When zoomed out, it lights up the whole area.
customer_reviews.author: James/Teri

customer_reviews.title: Great Flashlight!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband. He LOVES the light!!! Works well and does everything he needs.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Strudy flashlight
customer_reviews.text: This is a very powerful flashlight, I use it on Disaster Action Team responses for Red Cross. I have to work fire scenes that are very dark, and dangerous. This flashlight makes my job safer and easier. I have a smaller Duracell of the same design, which I find strong and durable. I have had many of the tactical lights that just do not hold up, like this one does.
customer_reviews.author: Jon_S

customer_reviews.title: Not worth money
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working correctly right after return date. When it does work, it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Dutragirl

customer_reviews.title: Brightest ever
customer_reviews.text: A friend had one- it was brighter than any flashlight I've ever owned so I asked my wife for one for Christmas. You can concentrate the light into an extremely strong, narrow beam. The body is heavy and has a nice, solid feel to it. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Woods

customer_reviews.title: Best flashlight for the money in a real emergency.
customer_reviews.text: This light will literally light up my whole yard at night. Allows me to watch my dogs on their nightly business trips. We live in an area with frequent coyotes, bear and lion visits, and this light allows me to check out the whole yard before I let my pups out for their last evening potty break.
customer_reviews.author: W. B. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: One handed zoom in and out
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd one of these. My first came from a big box store but I lost it. I loved it and was fortunate enough to find this one. This is a 4 c cell light, my other was a 3. I wish this was the smaller 3 cell one, but it is fine. Super bright and extremely easy to adjust the beam with just one hand.
customer_reviews.author: Britt A. Barfield

customer_reviews.title: Best flashlights to keep on hand
customer_reviews.text: I bought a second one these are so good to keep around the house. These are quality ones you can rely on instead of the crummy little plastic ones I had a gazillion of that never worked when I needed them. I just decided to buy two good, reliable ones and know that I can count on them.
customer_reviews.author: Herstory buff

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: Product is broken. The lightwork for 2 night and dead on the third night of use. Can not return product for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Quang Thinh Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Great flashlight!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this flashlight. It was (no longer) only available at Costco, and presumably the person selling these bought a stock of them. BRIGHT. Adjustable beam, Hefty weight. Very solid build-quality. Would buy again over and over.
customer_reviews.author: Peter G.

customer_reviews.title: The best ever.  All you will ever need.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a flashlight to use on nightly dog walks. This one literally lights up my whole back yard. I loved it so much that I ordered several others and gave them out as Christmas gifts. I also like the fact that it would make a great club should I need a weapon to defend myself on these night walks. Haha. Buy it you won’t be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: linda mcintyre

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.text: The flashlight is bright and durable. As a home inspector I go through quite a few flashlights by wearing them out. I am going to purchase another...I like the 3 function feature which is difficult to find...I don't need strobe or sos that adds to the wear on the push button that several flashlights have. Great product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Inspector E

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Light
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for $23.83 in Dec 2018. Very nice light, solid construction and well worth the price. Sliding focus works very well from a nice spot to a very very wide, very smooth flood light for lighting bigger work areas. Great to keep in your car. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves using these at night to take the puppy ...
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves using these at night to take the puppy for a walk. Very bright on the wide angle setting.
customer_reviews.author: John Z.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty - feels great in your hand.
customer_reviews.text: Carry this big light when walking our puppy after dark. Big bright light and the body of the light can be used to ward off any uninvited guests such as raccoons, feral cats, possums, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Good Flashlight
customer_reviews.text: A good flashlight - quality made. A solid flashlight. Would have put 5 stars, but I've only used it a few times so I don't have any idea how it will last. Looks like it will last a long time, though.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: It is not nearly as bright as the older model
customer_reviews.text: I had an earlier model and it was an amazing lite, but it was stolen and I had to replace it. So I ordered a new one, when it came it was a new version of the lite. It is not near as bright, the only plus is that the ends are rubberized.
customer_reviews.author: gordon lent

customer_reviews.title: Super bright!
customer_reviews.text: Super bright light. Much needed for dark areas I needed to walk through. I keep one in each car and have needed to use it. Glad it was there!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Pierson

customer_reviews.title: 1000 LUMENS
customer_reviews.text: When the power goes out, this flashlight will make your room look like daylight. Had one of these before from another co. The batteries leaked so the flashlight was ruined. This time I threw the Duracell batteries away and used Amazon batteries
customer_reviews.author: Charlie W

customer_reviews.title: Very bright!
customer_reviews.text: Overall the flashlight was great. I had one that was bad out of the box. I will say Amazon’s customer service is the best they took care of the issue immediately.
customer_reviews.author: chris weiss

customer_reviews.title: Great LED light
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my Son. He says at night time it lights up his back yard when trying to catch sneaky varmints in the his yard.
customer_reviews.author: LWR

customer_reviews.title: Not your average flashlight.
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful, very bright. Holds charge for extended amount of time. Beam lights up entire room or area
customer_reviews.author: Joseph B

customer_reviews.title: Durability to be determined
customer_reviews.text: Is a bit heavy but to be expected with 4 C-cells installed I suppose. I prefer the smaller versions that use AA or AAA but this flashlight provides a powerful beam when needed at night.
customer_reviews.author: wally tucker

customer_reviews.title: Great flashlight
customer_reviews.text: VERY bright, with a telescoping lens to make the light wide or narrow. Rugged and has a nice weight, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am very upset with it.
customer_reviews.text: Had it for a few days and it stop working and I try everything and it still will not work will not by this again very not happy at all.
customer_reviews.author: antonio mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Duracell makes quality products
customer_reviews.text: Keep in mind there is more than one style of this product. Pictures are not detailed enough to distinguish one from the other. I do like it, but it isn't as awesome as the first style that was offered by Duracell. I would still buy it, because I think Duracell products are high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great flashlight.
customer_reviews.text: Very bright. The adjustable light (flood to spot) is fantastic. I bought 4-5 as gifts for family members.
customer_reviews.author: Scott M.

customer_reviews.title: The BEST flashlight
customer_reviews.text: When the earthquakes rocked California we wanted to be prepared and had purchased this flashlight years prior because it was recommended to us a durable and bright flashlight. We now have 3 of them all throughout the house. They’re extremely bright and there’s a couple of different settings (strobe, etc) that ads an extra bonus.
customer_reviews.author: JenYosh

customer_reviews.title: Pierce the night with this baby
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome flashlights for the money, super bright with adjustable focus and they can take a beating. I dropped one from 4 ft onto concrete and no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Herbert Cheese

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable beam
customer_reviews.text: I like the brigt white beam. Additionally, the beam is adjustable from small beam to really wide beam by moving the head of the flashlight. Love that!!
customer_reviews.author: adolph ulloa

customer_reviews.title: Solid Work Flashlight
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy frame, very good illumination. You need to keep the rubber end on to turn flashlight end off to put in batteries, it interferes with my belt holster a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Eric  O

customer_reviews.title: Great Flashlight
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I have purchased. Much better that a Mag Light. I like the adjustable beam and the fact that it does not seem to drain the battery with a parasitic drain.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck & Lenna James

customer_reviews.title: Truly as advertised—lights up entire room
customer_reviews.text: Brightest flashlight that I own... indeed it does light up an entire room. Wish they would put them on sale
customer_reviews.author: W. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Best bright light for the money
customer_reviews.text: Probably the only light I have bought that has lived up to its lumen (1000) advertisement. And an updated switch to boot that has been a problem. But Duracell is great about replacing them also.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Gades

customer_reviews.title: This is the best flashlight I've ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: This is the best flashlight I've ever purchased. My son got one for Christmas and we recently used it during a blackout. It illuminated a big area of our house, so I bought a few of these to have for emergencies. Very impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Nice and bright!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new flashlight! It is so much brighter than my old Mikita flashlight and this one has an adjustable beam feature which is really handy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent flashlight
customer_reviews.text: Great illumination and great options in adjusting the “spot” size! Light and adaptable to whatever use!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very bright adjustable beam
customer_reviews.text: The light will actually come on with the first button push. Without hunting through a series of flashes,strobes and blinking lights. Beam is very strong and flashlight well built.
customer_reviews.author: Earl hicks

customer_reviews.title: Great flashlight
customer_reviews.text: Produces a ton of light, and the adjustable beam is great. A bit expensive though
customer_reviews.author: Scott L.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 for gifts for my grown sons...they all like them!
customer_reviews.author: Momajo

customer_reviews.title: Bright and well made!
customer_reviews.text: Bright! Easily zoomable, doesnt fall apart. Excellent flashlight! Will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Bright
customer_reviews.text: Very bright and great in the focused view and wide beam. Great visibility at night.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Frost

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to travel out of country. I love it & it gave me everything I needed it for. I'll buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Ihejirika

customer_reviews.title: Gnarly!
customer_reviews.text: Just a great flashlight and with all of the bad weather, it came in very handy.
customer_reviews.author: princess

customer_reviews.title: Return customer shock....
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best flashlight I've owned in forever....Purchased one of these for less than $20 in November of 2018, and check out the price now....Uh Oh.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Clikk

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this flashlight! It works great! Very sturdy. Long lasting batteries!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Canterbury

customer_reviews.title: Like a handheld spotlight
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy duty light. It lights up the entire yard and is quite sturdy. I was quite happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: stillinco

customer_reviews.title: Great Flash Light
customer_reviews.text: I like this flashlight alot. Bought it to brighten up the backyard and keep a safe watch while my dogs are out at night. If I see a set of eyes glaring back from a distance... I can zoom in on the object... So far its only been deer.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Super bright flashlight
customer_reviews.text: This flashlight lights up my entire backyard! I’m very happy with this purchase, would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Inge S Weatherbie

customer_reviews.title: 3-Way Flashlight
customer_reviews.text: Shines a long ways and very bright. It is nice to have two brightness levels as well as having the strobe function. Actually purchased 2 more.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Hodge

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, bright light.
customer_reviews.text: Just put dielectric grease on each end of the batteries before install to mitigate corrosion, which breaks the connection between the batteries.
customer_reviews.author: fabricator450

customer_reviews.title: let there be light!
customer_reviews.text: One's in the truck, the other two are in the motorhome and boat.
customer_reviews.author: Basque

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and bright but burns through batteries too fast.
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that the batteries just don’t last long. I’m on my second set in 6 weeks only using the flashlight a few mins every few days.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great flashlight
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty light weight. You can change the beam of the light to your needs. It is nice and bright.
customer_reviews.author: coder01

customer_reviews.title: Reliable bright works well
customer_reviews.text: A great workable flashlight. I use it constantly especially easy to use and the three distinct features are excellent
customer_reviews.author: Chessiesky

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy. Not returnable.
customer_reviews.text: This item is broken doesn’t work. Cannot even return it or exchange. Pure garbage.
customer_reviews.author: J. C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful Flashlight. One of the best we have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Antiquer

customer_reviews.title: Powerful flashlight
customer_reviews.text: The beam is awesome! It comes down to a small square from a very large beam. And it still has a nicer compact shape for being a large flashlight. Definitely worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann H.

customer_reviews.title: Over priced
customer_reviews.text: The light is over priced-cosco $15- the flashlight has 1000 Lums/cosco -1500– this light is a rip off
customer_reviews.author: dean bocci

customer_reviews.title: Fog in the lens in the rain
customer_reviews.text: These are outstanding flashlights. However, I can not give them a 5- rating because the sliding focus feature absorbs moisture in the rain and fogs the lens on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Obama

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: People say they dont tend to work..but hey..mine works..bright light..30 bucks..and can always return free..wheres the problems?
customer_reviews.author: Darren R.

customer_reviews.title: Great light
customer_reviews.text: Very good value, lights up the woods behind the house.
customer_reviews.author: Tina R. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: If you only have one flashlight this should be it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Brightest flashlight I ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Uses 4 Duracell C batteries which are not that expensive.
customer_reviews.author: GARDEN NUT

customer_reviews.title: The batteries last a long time.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a mechanic , this is the best flash light I ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: Will not buy again save your money
customer_reviews.text: After receiving my package opened it up Long behold put the batteries in and it does not work waste of money
customer_reviews.author: erik aguiluz

customer_reviews.title: Flashlight works great. Only problem is that i work in rough ...
customer_reviews.text: Flashlight works great. Only problem is that i work in rough environments and it started to malfunction the first night out on the job. If i was to use it in fairly normal confitions then i would say this is the way to go, good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Trevino

customer_reviews.title: This would be a fantastic flashlight it they could make a good switch for ...
customer_reviews.text: This would be a fantastic flashlight it they could make a good switch for it,I was told it uses power just sitting there
customer_reviews.author: GLOCKIOMM

customer_reviews.title: Bright on!
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit heavy, but boy is it bright! Plenty of light by which to change a tire, climb stairs late at night, find a hearing aid battery in the rug! Got for us, one for mom and one for brother = all are happy. Easy to use. Sturdily built. Worth the $. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DML

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: best emergency flashlight for the car that I have found,the wife ordered one as well.
customer_reviews.author: Fstopf4

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: These are the only brand of flash lights I buy
customer_reviews.author: appleton

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves the lumens and we loved the value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: crybabyjj

product_meta.title: Duracell Durabeam Ultra LED Flashlight 1000 Lumens
feature_bullets: Make sure this fits. by entering your model number.
Duracell Durabeam Ultra LED Flashlight 1000 Lumens
ZOOM FOCUS Slide head to focus beam
